short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep Track of Your Daily Tasks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RoutineList allows the user to keep track of their daily tasks by way of checkboxes that uncheck themselves on the days of the week the user designates as days they should do that task on. It's a great way to save paper and time, preventing the user from having to write out a daily to-do list. This was inspired by a daily to-do list over fifty items long, and built to expedite that process.
